causes: policy violations (claims, restricted products, IP issues)
late shipment rate, cancellation rate, negative feedback
immediate_actions: identify the exact suspension reason from the performance notification
gather evidence (invoices, supplier info, screenshots, QC steps)
write a clean POA: root cause → corrective actions → preventive measures
mistakes: sending emotional appeals instead of structured POA
missing invoices or providing unverifiable supplier docs
prevention: maintain supplier verification and invoice records
tight QC and compliance checks per listing
use conservative claims and accurate product descriptions
document SOPs for returns, fulfillment, and customer service
